name: Fidget Spinner - Finger Simulator
description:
Relax and relieve stress by spinning the best Fidget Spinner for as long as you want!

Spin the fidget spinner to help keep focus and relieve stress. Test your spinning skills by challenging your friends and family by getting a high score!.

[Features]
- 30+ awesome spinners
- 8+ different backgrounds
- Realistic swipe simulation, give it a spin.

Stop spending hundreds of dollars on expensive spinner toys, we have more spinners coming soon in the next free update. Stay tuned! Let us know what you want us to add.
